alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 6:08AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON... OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to a quarter mile or less. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 605 AM EDT, a 10 mile wide lake effect snow band was located from near Sandy Creek to Croghan. This snow band will drift slowly south this morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Sandy Island Beach State Park, Carthage, Lowville, Pulaski, West Carthage, Adams, Herrings, Selkirk Shores State Park, Barnes Corners, Southwick Beach State Park, Adams Center, Richland, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Rodman, Orwell, Lorraine and Copenhagen. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 34 and 41. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
